name: df-oml
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(coml, crab(s0, col, wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), cfv(cjn, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), cfv(cmee, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(coc, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))))))
comment: Define the class of orthomodular lattices. Definition from [Kalmbach] p. 16. (Contributed by NM, 18-Sep-2011.)
